alert.note: Alert for Iron (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 3:38PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following county, Iron. * WHEN...Until 645 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 335 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain that has moved debris onto SR-143 at MP 13 due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... SR-143 near Brian Head.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
